code: @Override public final Integer doInPreparedStatement(PreparedStatement ps) throws SQLException, DataAccessException {     LobCreator lobCreator = this.lobHandler.getLobCreator().     try {         setValues(ps, lobCreator).         return ps.executeUpdate().     } finally {         lobCreator.close().     } }

comment: /**  * Set values on the given PreparedStatement, using the given  * LobCreator for BLOB/CLOB arguments.  * @param ps the PreparedStatement to use  * @param lobCreator the LobCreator to use  * @throws SQLException if thrown by JDBC methods  * @throws DataAccessException in case of custom exceptions  */
code: /**  * Set values on the given PreparedStatement, using the given  * LobCreator for BLOB/CLOB arguments.  * @param ps the PreparedStatement to use  * @param lobCreator the LobCreator to use  * @throws SQLException if thrown by JDBC methods  * @throws DataAccessException in case of custom exceptions  */ protected abstract void setValues(PreparedStatement ps, LobCreator lobCreator) throws SQLException, DataAccessException.
